|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5TEJ |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640DBTC-90G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4H561638J-LCCC; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1112;88E1112-NNC1, QR47531.3, 0750 C2P, TW; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1112;88E1112-NNC1, QR47531.3, 0750 C2P, TW; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6131;88E6131-LAR1, AJJNQ.1, 0746 B2P, TW; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:1F:33, 00:24:B2 |oui = 00:1F:33, 00:24:B2 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.1;Marvell; |stockos = Linux;2.4.27;-vrs1; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, internal,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, JP2,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = boot log |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;RFMD;RF5125;RF, 5125, H9F8;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEAR |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR$ |default_ch = |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H092 |manuf_rev = T00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/02/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8363;88W8363-BEM1, FT96431.1, 0807 A5P, TW; |rad1chip2 = Marvell;88W8060; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Per a dissected US unit.. *"U12H092", "Rev. 2", and "GP" is silkscreened on the board. :All radial capacitors used are '''CapXon''' branded. *The device has 8MB Flash and 32MB RAM. :The specific P/Ns used are in the infobox. :The [http://club.netgear.com.cn/Knowledgebase/Document.aspx?Did=216 '''netgear.com.cn''' device table] also specifies :the device as having 8MB Flash and 32MB RAM. *The 802.11n radio is using two [http://www.rfmd.com/CS/Documents/5125DS.pdf ''RFMD'' RF5125] :2.4-2.5GHz Power Amplifier ICs {{Netgear WNR3500 Comparison Chart}} ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
(3.3) (RxD) (...) (...) (TxD) (GND)
1               JP2
{{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
